mapper.insert:
SELECT teampj.seq_FAQ.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO teampj.FAQ (FAQNO, FAQCATEGORY, FAQTITLE, FAQCONTENT, FAQREGDATE, FAQMODDATE, FAQDELFLAG) VALUES (#{faqno}, #{faqcategory}, #{faqtitle}, #{faqcontent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, 0)
